title: Claws of Guthix

properties.name: description
properties.value: Claws of Guthix is a combat spell in the standard spellbook. Casting it requires a Magic level of 60 in addition to having either a guthix staff, void knight mace, or staff of balance equipped, and requires 1 fire rune, 2 blood runes, and 4 air runes. The spell is unlocked by completing Mage Arena I, and must be cast 100 times within the arena itself in order to be used anywhere else.

Claws of Guthix
Released 22 September 2003 (Update)
Members Yes
Level 60
Spellbook Standard
Type Combat
Experience 35
Element God
Damage • 20
Charged & Guthix cape worn:
• 30
Runes 4 1 2
Casting speed 5 ticks
Quest Mage Arena
Description Summons the power of Guthix
Animation
Sound Effect
Please add a sound effect!

Claws of Guthix is a combat spell in the standard spellbook. Casting it requires a Magic level of 60 in addition to having either a guthix staff, void knight mace, or staff of balance equipped, and requires 1 fire rune, 2 blood runes, and 4 air runes. The spell is unlocked by completing Mage Arena I, and must be cast 100 times within the arena itself in order to be used anywhere else.

Claws of Guthix has a maximum hit of 20. Like the other God spells, Saradomin Strike and Flames of Zamorak, the spell Charge temporarily increases the maximum hit to 30. Upon a successful hit, Claws of Guthix lowers the target's Defence by 5%. This decrease does not stack nor will it reapply itself until the opponent returns to their base Defence level.

The Void knight mace and the Staff of Balance are capable of autocasting Claws of Guthix.

While a rune-providing staff cannot be used with this spell, a tome of fire will provide unlimited fire runes. However, the spell will not receive the 50% damage boost given by the tome, nor will charges from the tome be consumed.

Note that since Claws of Guthix requires a Guthix staff, Void knight mace or a Staff of balance, rune-providing staves cannot be used.

Casting it requires a [[Magic]] level of 60 in addition to having either a [[guthix staff]], [[void knight mace]], or [[staff of balance]] equipped, and requires 1 [[fire rune]], 2 [[blood rune]]s, and 4 [[air rune]]s. The spell is unlocked by completing [[Mage Arena I]], and must be cast 100 times within the [[Mage Arena|arena]] itself in order to be used anywhere else. Claws of Guthix has a maximum hit of 20. Like the other [[God spells]], [[Saradomin Strike]] and [[Flames of Zamorak]], the spell [[Charge]] temporarily increases the maximum hit to 30. Upon a successful hit, Claws of Guthix lowers the target's [[Defence]] by 5%. This decrease does not stack nor will it reapply itself until the opponent returns to their base Defence level. The [[Void knight mace]] and the [[Staff of balance|Staff of Balance]] are capable of [[autocast]]ing Claws of Guthix. While a [[runes|rune]]-providing staff cannot be used with this spell, a [[tome of fire]] will provide unlimited fire runes. However, the spell will not receive the 50% damage boost given by the tome, nor will charges from the tome be consumed. ==Cost== {{Spell cost table |Rune1 = fire |Rune1num = 1 |Rune2 = blood |Rune2num = 2 |Rune3 = air |Rune3num = 4 |nostaff = 1 }} Note that since Claws of Guthix requires a Guthix staff, Void knight mace or a Staff of balance, rune-providing staves cannot be used. ==Changes== {{Subject changes header}} {{Subject changes |date = 7 March 2019 |update = QoL and W45 Changes |poll = Quality of Life - Miscellaneous 2019 |change = The icon was [[Graphical updates|graphically updated]] to be more distinct from the other god spells. }} {{Subject changes footer}} {{Mage Arena}} {{Mage Arena I}} {{Standard spellbook}}
